Iodine_Incorporation.Method: soaking single crystals in iodine–cyclohexane solution (0.01 M) overnight
Iodine_Incorporation.Post_treatment: washed with chloroform until filtrate was clear (approximately 4–6 repeats)

Powder_X-ray_Diffraction.Sample_preparation: grinding single-crystal samples and allowing the powders to dry in air

Nuclear_Magnetic_Resonance.Sample_preparation: acid-digestion approach to dissolve TRUMOF-1 samples in DCl/D2O solution and deuterated DMSO for NMR analysis

Infrared_and_Raman_Spectroscopy.Raman_Laser: Renishaw plc RL785 red diode laser
Infrared_and_Raman_Spectroscopy.Sample_preparation: dried samples placed directly onto equipment

Thermogravimetric_Analysis.Conditions: flowing N2, ramp rate of 5 ºC min–1 from 25 to 700 ºC
Thermogravimetric_Analysis.Sample_preparation: soaked in DCM for two consecutive days and dried under vacuum

Single-Crystal_X-ray_Diffraction.Crystal_mounting: mounted on a 0.2 mm diameter MiTeGen loop using Paratone-N oil as a cryoprotectant

Extended_X-ray_Absorption_Fine_Structure.Sample_preparation: prepared as pellets using a manual hydraulic press with cellulose

Gas_Adsorption.Conditions: activated at 150 ºC under dynamic vacuum at 10-4 mbar for 120 h
